name: reldmtng

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, ctng, universe, universe, co(co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cv(hs1), cfv(csg, cv(hs0))))), csts, cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cv(hs1), cfv(csg, cv(hs0)))))))
stmt.pretty: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, ctng, universe, universe, ((hs0[sSet]<(dist ` ndx),(hs1 ∘(-g ` hs0))>)[sSet]<(TopSet ` ndx),(MetOpen `(hs1 ∘(-g ` hs0)))>))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(ctng))
-| wceq(ctng, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, co(co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cv(hs1), cfv(csg, cv(hs0))))), csts, cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cv(hs1), cfv(csg, cv(hs0))))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(toNrmGrp))
⊣ toNrmGrp =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs0[sSet]<(dist ` ndx),(hs1 ∘(-g ` hs0))>)[sSet]<(TopSet ` ndx),(MetOpen `(hs1 ∘(-g ` hs0)))>))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)
